title: Himiko's Revival Path I
desc: The ancient temple’s gates creaked open, revealing the path to the Seventh Divine Realm. Himiko stepped inside and was met with a familiar face—Kaguya.

title: Himiko's Revival Path II
desc: Where is this place? Something felt amiss, as if a piece of her memory was missing. Cold. That was the only sensation. Ahead, a flicker of fire. Someone was there.
unlock_desc: Unlocks after completing Himiko’s Revival Path I

title: Himiko's Revival Path III
desc: Himiko found herself in a land where spring reigned eternal. A mischievous grin greeted her—Nekomata blocked her path with playful mockery: “Grateful for your special invitation.”
unlock_desc: Unlocks after completing Himiko’s Revival Path II

title: Himiko's Revival Path IV
desc: Deeper into the temple, Himiko advanced toward a radiant glow. Suddenly, Ra emerged, his towering presence radiating unyielding power, his piercing gaze fixed upon her.
unlock_desc: Unlocks after completing Himiko’s Revival Path III

title: Himiko's Revival Path V
desc: Overcoming countless trials, she finally approached the altar. The Creator’s light, enveloping the chamber, seemed almost within reach. Yet, just as Himiko took that final step, a figure appeared silently before her.
unlock_desc: Unlocks after completing Himiko’s Revival Path IV

title: Himiko's Revival Path VI
desc: Look—who did she meet? The brilliance of Amaterasu pierced through the clouds, illuminating the entire altar. Divine light filled the air, suffusing it with an aura of sacred majesty.
unlock_desc: Unlocks after completing Himiko’s Revival Path V

title: Asura's Revival Path I
desc: Asura enters the outer layer of the sanctum. Considering flame as the best forge of her blades, she wants to prove her truth to the Creator.

title: Asura's Revival Path II
desc: Asura meets Cupid in the solitary courtyard and sniffs at Cupid's persistence on love and bonding, considering power as her only faith.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Asura's Revival Path I

title: Asura's Revival Path III
desc: Venus tries to stop Asura's road of destruction with beauty and harmony; however, Asura believes that true beauty lies in the limbo between life and death.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Asura's Revival Path II

title: Asura's Revival Path IV
desc: In the frozen land, Frost Dragon attempts to freeze Asura's flame and set everything to eternal slumber. But Asura tries to break the silence with hellfire.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Asura's Revival Path III

title: Asura's Revival Path V
desc: Storm Dragon confronts Asura with her unstoppable thunder of speed and destruction. Asura welcomes her power with excitement: she will prove that her blade is quicker than thunder.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Asura's Revival Path IV

title: Asura's Revival Path VI
desc: Before the Creator's Altar, the pride Fallen Angel, Lucifer stand before Asura. Undaunted, Asura knows she can fell gods and demons alike.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Asura's Revival Path V

title: Merlin's Revival Path I
desc: Merlin enters the Creator Sanctum, fully aware that changing fate will demand a terrible price. Burning with rage, she seeks an unwritten future from the Creator.

title: Merlin's Revival Path II
desc: She encounters the archangel Raphael, embodiment of the Creator’s ordained order, who attempts to persuade Merlin to return to the proper path.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Merlin's Revival Path I

title: Merlin's Revival Path III
desc: At the entrance to the underworld, Merlin meets Hela, Goddess of Death. Hela believes all of Merlin’s struggles will inevitably lead to the ending Hela represents.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Merlin's Revival Path II

title: Merlin's Revival Path IV
desc: 遇到诡计之神洛基。洛基嘲笑梅林这位先知，认为他追求的**“自由”不过是另一种形式的控制欲。
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Merlin's Revival Path III

title: Merlin's Revival Path V
desc: Merlin confronts Freyja, Goddess of Love and War. Freyja questions whether Merlin has the courage to endure emotional sacrifice and profound loneliness for her goal.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Merlin's Revival Path IV

title: Merlin's Revival Path VI
desc: At the final threshold leading to the Creator’s Altar, Merlin meets Lilith, wielder of primal will. Lilith challenges Merlin’s faith in human reason itself.
unlock_desc: 完成梅林的创世圣境V后解锁

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path I
desc: Medusa enters the sacred realm and first encounters the Siren. Song clashes with the petrifying gaze for the first time.

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path II
desc: Crossing the coast, she meets Pandora holding the cursed box. A debate of calamity and hope unfolds.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path I

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path III
desc: On the Path of Judgment, Nemesis blocks the way. Justice collides with vengeance.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path II

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path IV
desc: Medusa faces her former nightmare, Poseidon. Confronting the source of fear, Medusa challenges her.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path III

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path V
desc: On the road to the core, Hades awaits. A final discourse between death and petrification unfolds.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path IV

title: Medusa the Cursebound's Revival Path VI
desc: The final trial brings Gaia, Mother of Earth. Medusa seeks her recognition and a new definition of creation.
unlock_desc: 完成咒缚者美杜莎的创世圣境V后解锁

desc: Medusa enters the sacred realm and first encounters the Siren. Song clashes with the petrifying gaze for the first time.

desc: Crossing the coast, she meets Pandora holding the cursed box. A debate of calamity and hope unfolds.

title: Venus's Revival Path III
desc: On the Path of Judgment, Nemesis blocks the way. Justice collides with vengeance.

title: Venus's Revival Path IV
desc: Medusa faces her former nightmare, Poseidon. Confronting the source of fear, Medusa challenges her.

title: Venus's Revival Path V
desc: On the road to the core, Hades awaits. A final discourse between death and petrification unfolds.

title: Venus's Revival Path VI
desc: The final trial brings Gaia, Mother of Earth. Medusa seeks her recognition and a new definition of creation.

title: Aquarius's Revival Path I
desc: Aquarius steps into the Sanctum. Rather than rushing to worship, she studies the laws that govern this place. At that moment, a sharp arrow is shot in front of her.

title: Aquarius's Revival Path II
desc: After breaking through the outer perimeter, a towering mountain cuts off the way ahead. Capricornus stands upon the only passage ahead like a living statue, radiating overwhelming authority.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Aquarius's Revival Path I

title: Aquarius's Revival Path III
desc: Passing through the barrier of stone, the surroundings turn dreamlike and surreal. A familiar figure appears before Aquarius—Pisces, who has only recently completed her own journey.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Aquarius's Revival Path II

title: Aquarius's Revival Path IV
desc: As the mist disperses, the road splits in two. Two identical figures block the way with playful laughter, making it impossible to distinguish truth from illusion.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Aquarius's Revival Path III

title: Aquarius's Revival Path V
desc: The closer Aquarius draws to the core, the stronger the pulse of life becomes. Idun stands beneath a golden apple tree, holding a fruit that releases an irresistible fragrance.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Aquarius's Revival Path IV

title: Aquarius's Revival Path VI
desc: At last, Aquarius arrives before the gates of the Creator's Courtyard. Venus, the goddess of beauty, lounges against the doorway, her beauty dimming all surrounding light.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Aquarius's Revival Path V

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path I
desc: Fuxi steps onto the Primal Land, where Gaia emerges and attempts to halt her advance with the laws of the earth.

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path II
desc: Fuxi reaches the realm of moon shade, where Chang’e tests her deductions through a tranquil, eternal stillness.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path I

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path III
desc: Fuxi enters the land where fate converge, where prophetic patterns overlap endlessly in space. Himiko attempts to seal her deductive path with a known future.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path II

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path IV
desc: Fuxi passes through a region where emotion and memory intertwine, old bonds resurfacing as Sim Cheong seeks to disrupt her deductions through feeling.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path III

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path V
desc: Fuxi steps into the blazing sun's core, where fixed order has solidified, and Ra suppresses all change with absolute law.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path IV

title: Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path VI
desc: Fuxi enters a hall forged of reason and truth, where rigid definitions seal away everything that has yet to be understood.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Fuxi the Heavenruler's Revival Path V

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅰ
desc: Athena enters the Sanctum. She does not bow to the temple, but stops to examine the order and boundaries before her.

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅱ
desc: The boundaries of the Sanctum rise, and the air grows thin. Icarus looks down from above, scorch marks still clinging to his wings.
unlock_desc: 完成雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅰ后解锁

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅲ
desc: Rules lose their edges here. Direction and time blur together. Chaos does not show herself, yet she is omnipresent, like she's reminding Athena that order was never the beginning of the world.
unlock_desc: 完成雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅱ后解锁

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅳ
desc: The Sanctum is frozen in absolute stability. Conflict is erased. Choice is stripped away. The Frost Dragon maintains a world that never collapses, yet can never progress.
unlock_desc: 完成雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅲ后解锁

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境V
desc: After the frost shatters, the energy deep within the Sanctum falls out of balance. Ember Dragon embodies the rebound of suppressed will. Power runs wild, rules are burned away. She is not a pure destroyer, but the backlash against absolute stability.
unlock_desc: 完成雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅳ后解锁

title: 雅典娜的创世圣境Ⅵ
desc: The core of the Sanctum begins to respond to change. The Storm Dragon, as the final executor, represents judgment and enforcement. Right and wrong are no longer debated: only the predetermined conclusion is carried out. Athena must face the Sanctum itself and give a final answer to whether wisdom needs to exist.
unlock_desc: 完成雅典娜的创世圣境V后解锁
